name: propose-times
title: Propose Times
description: Generate meeting time proposals from your SavvyCal or Cal.com availability
author: skinnyandbald

commands.name: propose-times
commands.title: Propose Times
commands.description: Generate a message with your available meeting times

preferences.name: savvycalToken
preferences.title: SavvyCal API Token
preferences.description: Your SavvyCal Personal Access Token (starts with pt_secret_). Required if using SavvyCal.

preferences.name: savvycalLink
preferences.title: SavvyCal Link Slug
preferences.description: The slug from your SavvyCal URL (e.g., 'chat' from savvycal.com/you/chat). Required if using SavvyCal.

preferences.name: savvycalUsername
preferences.title: SavvyCal Username
preferences.description: Your SavvyCal username (e.g., 'skinnyandbald'). Required if using SavvyCal.

preferences.name: calcomUsername
preferences.title: Cal.com Username
preferences.description: Your Cal.com username (e.g., 'skinnyandbald' from cal.com/skinnyandbald/...). Required if using Cal.com.

preferences.name: calcomEventSlug
preferences.title: Cal.com Event Slug
preferences.description: The event type slug (e.g., 'pow-wow' from cal.com/you/pow-wow). Required if using Cal.com.

preferences.name: defaultTimezone
preferences.title: Default Recipient Timezone
preferences.description: Default timezone for the person you're proposing times to

preferences.name: defaultDaysAhead
preferences.title: Default Days Ahead
preferences.description: Default number of days to look ahead for availability

preferences.name: maxDaysToShow
preferences.title: Max Days to Show
preferences.description: Maximum number of days to include in the message

preferences.name: maxSlotsPerDay
preferences.title: Max Slots Per Day
preferences.description: Maximum number of time slots to show per day

preferences.name: bookerUrl
preferences.title: Booker URL
preferences.description: URL of your booker Vercel deployment (enables one-click booking for both providers). Leave empty to link directly to the calendar provider.
